description: The file 'App.tsx' defines the main React application component for a web frontend. It manages the application's theme, sets up routing with react-router-dom, and includes a navigation component to switch between different routes. It also initializes some environment/configuration values and provides a top-level structure for the UI.

methods.name: useActivePath
methods.description: Custom React hook that returns the current pathname from the URL using 'useLocation' from react-router-dom.

methods.name: Navigation
methods.description: React component rendering navigation links; highlights the active route based on current URL.
